name: Garlock Online
description:
in Garlock Online you travel with your friends, collect points, fight monsters and earn merit in the game. Build, recruit and level up your sworn monsters to fight in pvp and resolve your quests.
Garlock will have three different character classes with they're own types of armors and weapons which are all fully upgradeable in the game.
Raise the health of your own monsters to improve the ability to survive and to grow up in the level.
Raise up in your own level to get stronger as your counterparty and to fight in epic pvp battles.

with Garlock Online we will present you a new game,
Play eciting missions, hunt monsters and fight in epic battles.

  • colorful graphics
  • a wide range of different raids
  • easier and faster progress

fight on the side of your friend or fight them!
help other players to have fun on the game
earn Batllemarks to collect Epic pvp Armouries and to unlock more battles
get an advantage infront of the normal players with the Item-Shop.
